sentences.en: Call signs , code words , today's encryption keys!
sentences.cn: 呼叫代号、暗语 、 还有今天的密钥!

sentences.en: Computer security technology includes mainly: Authentication, Encryption, Access Control, Auditing and so on.
sentences.cn: 计算机网络安全技术主要有: 认证授权(Authentication) 、 数据加密(Encryption) 、 访问控制(AccessControl) 、 安全审计(Auditing)等.

sentences.en: Drop rate of Encryption Method skills has been increased.
sentences.cn: 加密技术的技能书掉率增加.

sentences.en: Encryption systems and their ilk are technologies of disconnection.
sentences.cn: 加密系统还有它们的同类都是隔离的技术.

sentences.en: Encryption technique is the key technology of the ear of information.
sentences.cn: 加密技术是信息时代的关键技术.

sentences.en: I really like this feature, but after adding it to the installation the request to enter the encryption key is far from obvious.
sentences.cn: 我非常喜欢这个特性，但是在安装是勾选了这个设置后，输入加密密钥的请求却无从找寻。

sentences.en: It explores the essential technique of key management in security encryption.
sentences.cn: 探讨了安全加密系统中必须的密钥管理技术.

sentences.en: It mainly includes symmetric encryption algorithms and asymmetric cryptographic algorithms and protocols.
sentences.cn: 密码技术主要包括对称密码算法和非对称密码算法及协议.

sentences.en: Key management is critical technic of realizing database encryption.
sentences.cn: 密钥管理是实现数据库加密的关键技术.

sentences.en: MPEG 2 encoding and decoding the encryption of C source files.
sentences.cn: 本代码是MPEG2的编码的加密和解码的C源程序!

sentences.en: Secondly, it introduces XML Encryption , XML Signature, WS - Security and WS - License specifications.
sentences.cn: 然后介绍XML Encryption 和XMLSignature技术, 以及WS -Security 和WS-License规范.

sentences.en: Shows whether the user - defined function was created with an optional encryption parameter.
sentences.cn: 显示用户定义函数是否是用可选加密参数创建的.

sentences.en: SMIME is an encryption and digital - signature standard for e - mail .
sentences.cn: SMIME是 电子邮件 的加密和数字签名标准.

sentences.en: Software encryption has been realized by using EEPROM in the paper.
sentences.cn: 本文采用EEPROM串行存储器 件设计软件狗来实现软件加密.

sentences.en: The former symmetric encryption algorithms use substitution and transposition techniques.
sentences.cn: 原有对称加密算法采用置换与替换技术.

sentences.en: This paper discusses a algorithm of file encryption based on random factor.
sentences.cn: 本文提出一种基于随机码数列的文件加密算法.

sentences.en: You have not chosen an encryption key.
sentences.cn: 您还没有选择一个加密密钥。

phrases.tran_cn: 密码索引；密码键；加密钥匙
